The accused girls: Morgan Geyser and Anissa Weier, admitted to planning and executing the crime, stating that they did it to appease a supernatural being called Slenderman.
The girls discovered Slenderman on Creep: a website dedicated to Internet horror stories, and believed he was real.
The Slenderman: mythos" is a blend of fiction and folklore, resembling boogeyman tales of old.
The name: Slender Man" first appeared on SomethingAwful.com in 2009, in a Photoshop contest thread where a manipulated photograph depicted a tall, faceless figure with tentacle-like arms.
